CISS-VAE

ciss_vae.training.autotune.autotune

autotune(search_space, train_dataset, save_model_path=None, save_search_space_path=None, n_trials=20, study_name='vae_autotune', device_preference='cuda', optuna_dashboard_db=None, load_if_exists=True, seed=42, verbose=False, permute_hidden_layers=True, constant_layer_size=False, evaluate_all_orders=False, max_exhaustive_orders=100)[source]

Optuna-based hyperparameter search for the CISSVAE model. Runs initial training, then impute–refit loops per trial, and selects the trial with the lowest validation MSE. :type search_space: SearchSpace :param search_space: Hyperparameter ranges and fixed values. :type search_space: SearchSpace :type train_dataset: ClusterDataset :param train_dataset: Dataset containing masks, normalization, and cluster labels. :type train_dataset: ciss_vae.classes.cluster_dataset.ClusterDataset :type save_model_path: :param save_model_path: Optional path to save the best model’s state_dict. :type save_model_path: str | None :type save_search_space_path: :param save_search_space_path: Optional path to dump the resolved search-space. :type save_search_space_path: str | None :type n_trials: :param n_trials: Number of Optuna trials to run. :type n_trials: int :type study_name: :param study_name: Name for the Optuna study. :type study_name: str :type device_preference: :param device_preference: "cuda" or "cpu"; falls back to CPU if CUDA unavailable. :type device_preference: str :type optuna_dashboard_db: :param optuna_dashboard_db: RDB storage URL/file for dashboard (or None for in‑memory). :type optuna_dashboard_db: str | None :type load_if_exists: :param load_if_exists: Load existing study with the same name from storage. :type load_if_exists: bool :type seed: :param seed: Base RNG seed for order generation etc. :type seed: int :type verbose: :param verbose: If True, prints diagnostic logs. :type verbose: bool :type permute_hidden_layers: bool :param permute_hidden_layers: If True, randomize layer orders per trial. :type permute_hidden_layers: bool :type constant_layer_size: bool :param constant_layer_size: If True, all hidden layers use the same size. :type constant_layer_size: bool :returns: Tuple (best_imputed_df, best_model, study, results_df) :rtype: (pandas.DataFrame, CISSVAE, optuna.study.Study, pandas.DataFrame) :raises ValueError: If search space parameters are malformed or incompatible.
